HOME.LIST_RV_TITLE: List your RV today and start making money!
HOME.RENT_RV_TITLE: Find the perfect RV for your next adventure!
HOME.HELP_TITLE: Need some help using our site?
HOME.DASHBOARD_TITLE: View and manage my account with RVezy.
HOME.SIGN_IN_TITLE: Sign in to your RVezy account.
HOME.A_VALID_EMAIL_BLOCK: A valid e-mail address. All e-mails from the system will be sent to this address. The e-mail address is not made public and will only be used if you wish to receive a new password or wish to receive certain news or notifications by e-mail.
HOME.MINIMUM_CHARACTER: The password must be of minimum length 6 characters
HOME.MAXIMUM_CHARACTER: The password must be of maximum length 50 characters
HOME.CAPTCHA_NOT_MATCH: The answer you entered for the CAPTCHA was not correct.
HOME.BY_JOINING: By joining you agree to the

LANDING_PAGE.LISTING_IS_FREE: Listing on RVezy is always free. In a few quick steps we will have you on your way to sharing your RV with people just like you across Canada and earning an additional income in the process.
LANDING_PAGE.SEARCH_OUR_SELECTION_OF_RV: Search our selection of RV rentals situated across Canada. Whether a parked RV at a seasonal site or an RV you can take on the road, you will be sure to find your perfect vacation getaway here.
LANDING_PAGE.ONCE_FIND_PERFECT_RV: Once you find the perfect RV rental, make a request to book and communicate directly with the RV owner and introduce yourself.
LANDING_PAGE.ONCE_RENTAL_CONFIRMED: Once your rv rental is confirmed, follow our simple to use payment system to pay for your dream vacation.
LANDING_PAGE.ON_THE_DAY_YOUR_RENTAL: On the day of your rental meet with the owner who will go through the operation of the RV and start enjoying Canada the way it is supposed to be experienced!
LANDING_PAGE.MEMBER_ORVDA: We are proud members of the ORVDA
